resources: LAB_WEEK_03 [cite: 481] AFFOGATO [cite: 482] Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup. [cite: 483] AMERICANO [cite: 484] Espresso with added hot water (100-150 ml). Often served in a cappuccino cup. (The espresso is added into the hot water rather than all the water being flowed through the coffee that would lead to over extraction.) [cite: 485, 486] CAFFE LATTE [cite: 487] A tall, mild \'milk coffee\' (about 150-300 ml). An espresso with steamed milk and only a little milk foam poured over it. Serve in a latte glass or a coffee cup. Flavored syrup can be added. [cite: 488, 489] Coffee List [cite: 490]
